SOURCE_2_SQL: SELECT * FROM MRC.VW_459 where rownum < 100000

SELECT /*+use_hash(f.r1 f.r2 f.r3) parallel(f.r1 32) parallel(f.r2 32) parallel(f.r3 32)*/ SUM(OTMERCH_GROSS_GL) OTMERCH_GROSS_GL,AGREEMENT_ID,FEES_SEQNO,OTXACT,CUSTOMER_ID
FROM ttde_billing.invoice_details_for_recon_vw f
WHERE  exists(SELECT 1
              FROM bscs_for_mobilepayment.mp_credit_sncode t
              WHERE t.merchant_id = 400023406 and sncode = f.SNCODE and sncode not in(15175,15174,16592))
  AND f.ohentdate =
      DECODE (
              TO_NUMBER (TO_CHAR (TRUNC (SYSDATE), 'DD')),
                                   2, TO_DATE(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1)),  'DD.MM.YYYY'),
                                   12, TO_DATE ('10' || '. ' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (SYSDATE), 'MMYYYY'), 'DD.MM.YYYY'),
                                   22, TO_DATE ('20' || '. ' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (SYSDATE), 'MMYYYY'), 'DD.MM.YYYY'),
                                   27, TO_DATE ('25' || '. ' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (SYSDATE), 'MMYYYY'), 'DD.MM.YYYY')) group by AGREEMENT_ID,FEES_SEQNO,OTXACT,CUSTOMER_ID

select BANK_REFERENCE_ID, decode(substr(trim(AMOUNT_STR),1,1),'.', replace(trim(AMOUNT_STR),'.','0.'),substr(trim(AMOUNT_STR),1,2),'-.', replace(trim(AMOUNT_STR),'-.','-0.')) AMOUNT_STR,MSISDN,AGREEMENT_ID,TOTAL_PERIOD,EVCODE,BANK_ID,DESCRIPTION,STATUS,TRANSACTION_DATE from MICROPAYMENT_REPORT.VW_RA_TFS_ORDER

(select CUSTOMER_NUMBER,MSISDN,SUBSCRIBERID,MSTVPRODUCTID,SUBSCRIBERTYPE,STATUS AS ACTUAL_STATUS, DECODE(STATUS,'ACT_INPROGRESS','ACT_END',STATUS),'ADDON'  AS TYPE, AUTO_ID,OFFERCODE AS CODE,START_DATE from MRC.V_TV_ADDON_SUBSCRIPTIONS)
 UNION
  (select CUSTOMER_NUMBER,MSISDN,SUBSCRIBER_ID AS SUBSCRIBERID,MSTVPRODUCTID,SUBSCRIBERTYPE,STATUS AS ACTUAL_STATUS, DECODE(STATUS,'ACT_INPROGRESS','ACT_END',STATUS),'MAIN'  AS TYPE, AUTO_ID,CODE,START_DATE  from MRC.V_TV_MAIN_SUBSCRIPTIONS)

SELECT AGREEMENT_ID, SEQNO, sum(amount)*period AMOUNT
  FROM ttde_billing.audit_fees_vw f
 WHERE     f.sncode IN (SELECT TO_CHAR (t.sncode)
                          FROM bscs_for_mobilepayment.mp_credit_sncode t
                         WHERE t.merchant_id = 400023406)
       AND TRUNC (entdate) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE - 1)
group by AGREEMENT_ID, SEQNO

SOURCE_1_SQL:
SELECT substr(MSISDN,3) MSISDN,listagg(offer.external_offer_id,',')within group ( order by offer.external_offer_id) sdpa_offer_id
FROM slcm_hera.slcm_subscriber subscriber,
     slcm_hera.slcm_subscription  subscription,
     slcm_hera.slcm_offer         offer
WHERE     subscription.offer_id = offer.offer_id
  AND subscription.receiver_id = subscriber.subscriber_id
  AND subscription.status NOT IN (2, 3)
  AND subscriber.status NOT IN (2, 3)
  AND subscriber.subscriber_id between %d and %d
group by MSISDN
SOURCE_2_SQL:
select /*+ use_hash(da,uc,offer) parallel(da, 16) parallel(uc, 16) parallel(offer,16)*/
da.MSISDN,da.resource_ids DA_RESOURCE_IDS,uc.resource_ids UC_RESOURCE_IDS,offer.resource_ids OFFER_RESOURCE_IDS
from  
csn.GRANITE_AGG_DA da,
csn.GRANITE_AGG_UC uc,
csn.GRANITE_AGG_OFFER offer
where da.MSISDN = uc.MSISDN and da.MSISDN = offer.MSISDN

select /*+ full(subscriber) parallel(subscriber 32) full(subscription) parallel(subscription 32) full(offer) parallel(offer 32)*/
    subscriber.MSISDN,
    subscriber.STATUS,
    listagg(offer.external_offer_id, ',') within group ( order by offer.external_offer_id) external_offer_id,
    listagg(subscription.status, ',') within group ( order by subscription.status) statuses
FROM slcm_hera.slcm_subscriber subscriber,
     slcm_hera.slcm_subscription subscription,
     slcm_hera.slcm_offer offer
WHERE subscription.offer_id = offer.offer_id
  AND subscription.receiver_id = subscriber.subscriber_id
  AND subscription.status in (1, 2)
  AND subscriber.status in (1, 2)
  AND (offer.external_offer_id = '604105291' or lower(offer.offer_name) like '%superbox%')
group by subscriber.MSISDN,subscriber.STATUS

select TTSERVICENO, CDSIDCODE, ENDDATE  from GRANITE.T_GRANITE_ADSL_DATA where cdsidcode not in ('ACT_INPROGRESS','DEACT_END') or (cdsidcode = 'DEACT_END' and enddate>=trunc(last_day(add_months(sysdate, -2))+1))

SOURCE_1_SQL:
SELECT 
    subscriber.msisdn,offer.offer_name,offer.external_offer_id sdpa_offer_id
FROM slcm_hera.slcm_subscriber subscriber,
   slcm_hera.slcm_subscription  subscription,
   slcm_hera.slcm_offer         offer
WHERE     subscription.offer_id = offer.offer_id
   AND subscription.receiver_id = subscriber.subscriber_id
   AND subscription.status NOT IN (2, 3)
   AND subscriber.status NOT IN (2, 3)
   AND subscriber.msisdn like '9053551%'
SOURCE_2_SQL:
select /*+ use_hash(da,uc,offer) parallel(da, 16) parallel(uc, 16) parallel(offer,16)*/
da.MSISDN,da.resource_ids DA_RESOURCE_IDS,uc.resource_ids UC_RESOURCE_IDS,offer.resource_ids OFFER_RESOURCE_IDS
from  
csn.GRANITE_AGG_DA da,
csn.GRANITE_AGG_UC uc,
csn.GRANITE_AGG_OFFER offer
where da.MSISDN = uc.MSISDN and da.MSISDN = offer.MSISDN and da.msisdn like '53551%'

select rgr.transaction_ID, gr.status_code,VALIDATION_STATUS,VALIDATION_DESC, gr.trace_status from mrc.t_rrm_ginger_request rgr join mrc.t_ginger_request gr on gr.id = rgr.ID where gr.create_time between trunc(sysdate-1) and trunc(sysdate)

SOURCE_1_SQL:
SELECT /*+ full(subscriber) parallel(subscriber 32) full(subscription) parallel(subscription 32) full(offer) parallel(offer 32)*/
       substr(MSISDN,3) MSISDN,listagg(offer.external_offer_id||'_'||subscriber.payment_method,',')within group ( order by offer.external_offer_id) sdpa_offer_id
FROM slcm_hera.slcm_subscriber subscriber,
     slcm_hera.slcm_subscription  subscription,
     slcm_hera.slcm_offer         offer
WHERE     subscription.offer_id = offer.offer_id
  AND subscription.receiver_id = subscriber.subscriber_id
  AND subscription.status NOT IN (2, 3)
  AND subscriber.status NOT IN (2, 3)
  AND MSISDN like '905332%'
group by MSISDN
SOURCE_2_SQL:
select /*+ use_hash(da,uc,offer) parallel(da, 16) parallel(uc, 16) parallel(offer,16)*/
    COALESCE(da.MSISDN, uc.MSISDN, offer.MSISDN) MSISDN,
    nvl(da.resource_ids, '-')                     DA_RESOURCE_IDS,
    nvl(uc.resource_ids, '-')                     UC_RESOURCE_IDS,
    nvl(offer.resource_ids, '-')                  OFFER_RESOURCE_IDS
from csn.GRANITE_AGG_DA da
         FULL OUTER JOIN csn.GRANITE_AGG_UC uc on da.MSISDN = uc.MSISDN
         FULL OUTER JOIN csn.GRANITE_AGG_OFFER offer on offer.MSISDN = COALESCE(da.MSISDN, uc.MSISDN)
WHERE da.MSISDN like '53667841%' and uc.MSISDN like '53667841%' and offer.MSISDN like '53667841%'
SELECT * FROM TBAS.DBS_TBAS_INVOICES_VW
